description: Bottlebrush Bush (Callistemon 'Woodlander's Hardy') is an amazing plant species to add to any garden. It produces many spectacular, deep red flowers measuring up to 6 inches in length, and can reach heights of up to 5 feet. It requires little maintenance and is extremely hardy in most soils and climates. Its delightful foliage and beautiful flowers make it a wonderful addition to any garden, and it will attract birds and other wildlife. Bottlebrush Bush is also an ideal plant for creating low hedging or barriers in a garden. Perfect for anyone looking to add a hardy and striking addition to their garden!
